query:
SELECT 
  h.id,
  h.vendaId,
  h.tipo,
  h.usuarioId,
  u.name AS usuarioNome,
  u.email AS usuarioEmail,
  h.dataAlteracao,
  h.motivo
FROM historico_alteracoes_vendas h
LEFT JOIN users u ON h.usuarioId = u.id
LEFT JOIN vendas v ON h.vendaId = v.id
LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id
LEFT JOIN turmas t ON f.turmaId = t.id
WHERE DATE(h.dataAlteracao) = CURDATE()
ORDER BY h.dataAlteracao DESC;

LEFT JOIN formandos f ON v.formandoId = f.id
LEFT JOIN turmas t ON f.turmaId = t.id

ORDER BY h.dataAlteracao DESC;
